content: BOGOTA Grupo Aval  Colombia's largest holding company  will issue 400 billion pesos ($132.9 million) in local bonds on Wednesday  the company said.
name: Grupo Aval Acciones y Valores SA
title: Colombia's Grupo Aval to issue $132.9 million in bonds

content: BOGOTA  June 27 Grupo Aval  Colombia's largest holding company  will issue 400 billion pesos ($132.9 million) in local bonds on Wednesday  the company said.
name: Grupo Aval Acciones y Valores SA
title: Colombia's Grupo Aval to issue $132.9 mln in bonds

content: * Said on Friday from July 9 has taken loans from Banco de Bogota totalling 100.5 billion Colombian pesos ($34.35 million) to support the ordinary course of business
name: Grupo Aval Acciones y Valores SA
title: BRIEF- Grupo Aval Acciones y Valores takes loans for $34 million
